Divine Favor (Archon Good1 Evoc): Self gains +3 attack and damage for 1 min

Holy Smite (Archon Good4 Evoc): R300' Evil creatures in 20' radius suffer 5d8 HP and blindness for 1 rd, neutral half (DC 16 Will half)

Magic Mouth (Arcana2 Illu): R75' Mouth appears and speaks 25 words upon trigger w/in 300' (DC 14 Will neg)

Spell Resistance (Arcana5 Abju): Touched gains SR 32 for 20 min
Spell Turning (Arcana7 Abju): 1d4+6 levels of non-area, non-ranged-touch spells directed at self reflect onto caster for 200 min
